text: Gamalier "Baby Bird" Rodríguez (Born on December 3, 1986 in Bayamón, Puerto Rico) is a Puerto Rican professional boxer. Rodriguez won the World Boxing Organization North American Boxing Organization featherweight title when he defeated Alicio Castaneda.Gamalier Rodriguez is Heading Over To Top Rank - Boxing News Rodriguez had multiple defenses of this title, including one over Orlando Cruz.Gamalier Rodriguez Decisions Orlando Cruz For Upset Win - Boxing News Rodríguez fought Vasyl Lomachenko for the WBO featherweight world title, he was knocked out 50 seconds into the 9th round. == References == Category:1986 births Category:Featherweight boxers Category:Living people Category:People from Bayamón, Puerto Rico Category:Puerto Rican male boxers
title: Gamalier Rodríguez
